column3:
ハテノ村の羊飼い トコユが
魔物にヒツジをさらわれて困っている

魔物はハテノビーチに住みついているという

魔物を全て倒すまで
ヒツジの被害は おさまることはなさそうだ
column4:
A shepherd in Hateno Village named Koyin is
worried that monsters will make off with her
flock of sheep.

According to her, the monsters in question
congregate atHateno Beach. She won't
breathe easy untilevery last monster there
is defeated.

column3:
ハテノビーチに住みついていた魔物を
全て退治した！

これでハテノ村のヒツジがさらわれる事も
無くなるだろう

ハテノ村のヒツジ飼いトコユに
魔物を退治した事を伝えよう
column4:
You defeated every last monster lurking
on Hateno Beach! The village is safe for
sheep at last.

Go tellKoyin in Hateno Village that the
monsters will trouble her flock no more.

column3:
ハテノビーチに住みついていた魔物を退治した事を
トコユに報告し お礼をもらった！

トコユが心を開いてくれた！
…ような気がする
column4:
You told Koyin that you cleared out the
monsters living on Hateno Beach. In return,
she gave you a handsome reward.

You feel like you're getting along quite well
with Koyin now! Maybe?
